name: Money Laundering
description:
There is a dark side to NFTs, albeit its climate impact, and a potential vehicle for fraud and money laundering. Here, I invite you to engage in ‘digital moral cleansing’, an opportunity for you to "wash away" your immoral acts by purchasing an NFT that would "clean" your moral debt. For each of these dark sides, the profits of the NFT will go to a respective charity or research organization. 

Money is the third out of the three pieces. With no government-backed regulatory body protecting or overseeing digital transactions worldwide, money launderers can easily exploit NFTs to wash the money they’ve obtained through illegal activities. This pdf contains all entities identified in the Panama Papers.

Proceeds from this NFT will go International Consortium of Investigative Journalists.
